• A total of 24 people were involved in the search, but helicopters were unable to fly due to adverse weather conditions

bullets: • The New York Times obtained a recording of a call from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention that officials have linked two massive US measles outbreaks
• The finding that the outbreaks are linked means there’s been continuous circulation within the country for about 10 months
• Canada lost its elimination status last week and measles will once again be considered endemic to the US

items.title: Meta wins monopoly trial, convinces judge that social networking is dead
bullets: • US District Judge James Boasberg said the FTC failed to show that Meta has a monopoly in a market dubbed “personal social networking” The FTC had tried to block the purchase of Instagram and WhatsApp
• But the days of grouping apps into “separate markets of social networking and social media” are over, he said
• The judge agreed with Meta that social media as it was known in Facebook’s early days is dead

• Surprisingly, the pain relief didnâ't use typical cannabinoid receptors, instead calming abnormal nerve activity more directly
• The findings hint at new avenues for treating chronic pain and neurological diseases

items.title: Why some ant colonies get tricked into killing their own queens
bullets: • Some female ants practice a kind of chemical warfare that lets them sneak into the established colonies of other ant species and manipulate the worker ants into committing regicide
• The queen is paramount in an ant colony; the queen produces all the eggs, while the workers take care of her
• After a colony has been around awhile, however, it will start to produce some females capable of reproduction
• These females fly away, in order to establish new colonies and their own reigns

items.title: Europe’s cookie nightmare is crumbling
bullets: • The European Commission wants browsers to manage cookie preferences instead of pop-ups
• The move is part of a new Digital Package of proposals to simplify the EU’s digital rules
• Websites will be required to respect cookie choices for at least six months

items.title: TikTok is letting users control how much AI content they see
bullets: • TikTok is testing a new control that will let users manage how much AI-generated content appears in their video feed on the app
• To help make the filter more effective, the app will also soon start adding invisible watermarks to AI content
• An AI slider will only work if TikTok itself knows which content is made with AI

items.title: Ticket prices increased 5% in Q3 vs. 2024
bullets: • In Q3, despite a decline in overall box office performance compared to 2024, the average ticket price reached $11.79, with an annual inflation rate of 5%, consistent with the second quarter
• While attendance fell year over year, average ticket prices continued to rise due to ongoing pricing strategies and the expansion of premium formats
